title: 101 Most Popular Funds for Retirement Savers
text:
print order a reprint 101 Most Popular Funds for Retirement Savers Take a look at BrightScope's rankings of the 101 most popular mutual funds based on 401(k) assets under management. Follow @Kiplinger 
Americans have $4.4 trillion invested in 401(k)s, according to the Investment Company Institute, making these tax-deferred savings accounts a vital part of retirement planning for many. BrightScope , a financial-information company that rates retirement savings plans, compiled this list for Kiplinger of the most popular mutual funds based on funds' 401(k) assets under management. 
Here is the list of the top 101 funds for 401(k)s.
